plot outline: It is a story of intricacies of delicate relationships. The most predominant relationship focused in the is the father and a girl child. The story starts by Prakash Rai telling Ramesh, a stranger he meets on the way to, the story of his daughter. The story starts revealing many other dimensions of the beautiful relation he had with his daughter. It starts from the day she was born till she got settled. It is a story of love, expectation, disappointment and realization.
title: Naanu Nanna Kanasu
plot: It is a story of intricacies of delicate relationships. The most predominant relationship focused in the is the father and a girl child. The story starts by Prakash Rai telling Ramesh, a stranger he meets on the way to, the story of his daughter. The story starts revealing many other dimensions of the beautiful relation he had with his daughter. It starts from the day she was born till she got settled. It is a story of love, expectation, disappointment and realization.::Sumant Kulkarni
